skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I specialize in front-end development, where I focus on crafting engaging user interfaces and seamless user experiences. Leveraging technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I ensure that websites and applications are not only visually appealing but also functional and intuitive to navigate.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: My expertise in back-end development revolves around building robust and scalable server-side solutions to power dynamic web applications. With proficiency in languages like Node.js, I design and implement efficient APIs, manage databases, and handle server-side logic, ensuring smooth functionality and data management.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: In UI/UX design, I combine creativity with user-centric principles to design visually stunning and highly usable interfaces. Through thorough research, wireframing, and prototyping, I strive to understand user needs and behaviors, crafting interfaces that are intuitive and accessible, enhancing the overall user experience.

skills.title: Responsive Design
skills.description: My focus on responsive design ensures that websites I develop adapt seamlessly to various screen devices, providing users with an optimal viewing experience. Using a combination of fluid grids, and media queries, I create layouts that adjust dynamically, and accessibility across desktops, tablets, and mobile devices.

portfolio.title: PodPlug
portfolio.description: Developed an immersive podcast platform offering a user-friendly interface for effortless navigation. The platform ensures uninterrupted episode playback, and personalized favorites playlist. Utilize smart search and filtering options to effortlessly discover podcasts across genres and enhance your listening experience.

portfolio.title: Book Connect
portfolio.description: Crafted a seamless and user-friendly book-connect application, integrating responsive design and interactive features. Implemented a robust search functionality, allowing users to find books based on various criteria like title, author, genre. Maintained up-to-date documentation for the codebase and APIs.

portfolio.title: Gpt-3
portfolio.description: Effortlessly translating Figma designs into a sleek and responsive GPT-3 application, I've brought concepts to life seamlessly. The live demo showcases its capabilities, including instant conversion of designs into responsive apps, a modern and intuitive interface, and the magic of GPT-3 with its interactions.

portfolio.title: Modern Restaurant
portfolio.description: Crafting a fully responsive modern restaurant application, I've seamlessly translated Figma designs into a dynamic digital platform. The live demo showcases its features, including instant conversion of designs into responsive layouts, a sleek and intuitive interface tailored for modern dining experiences.
